title: [Feature] More intelligent service hierarchy analysis
description:
Search before asking

  • I had searched in the issues and found no similar feature requirement.

Description

We have good progress for v10 regarding service hierarchy analysis and visualization. Service hierarchy relation is there and represented well.

About this, we identified

  1. mesh -> mesh-dp
  2. mesh -> k8s
  3. agent -> k8s
  4. mesh-dp -> k8s

Actually, <1> and <4> logically should be equivalent with <2>. So @wankai123 Could we consider ignoring <2> when returning the final result to the UI? Then we could make the data more reasonable, and MESH layer to K8S layer line doesn't need to exist, and will not pass through MESH-DP layer.

Use case

No response

Related issues

No response

Are you willing to submit a pull request to implement this on your own?

  • Yes I am willing to submit a pull request on my own!
